import React from 'react'; import { ShoppingCart, Package, User, Settings, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const AdminDashboard = ({ user, stats }) => { const totalOrders = stats?.orders?.totalOrders || 0; const totalRevenue = stats?.orders?.totalRevenue || 0; const totalProducts = Array.isArray(stats?.products) ? stats.products.length : 0; const totalUsers = Array.isArray(stats?.users) ? stats.users.length : 0; const recentUsers = Array.isArray(stats?.users) ? stats.users.slice(0, 5) : []; const recentOrders = Array.isArray(stats?.orders?.recentOrders) ? stats.orders.recentOrders.slice(0, 5) : []; const lowStockProducts = Array.isArray(stats?.products) ? stats.products.filter(p => p.stockQuantity < 10) : []; const recentProducts = Array.isArray(stats?.products) ? stats.products.slice(-5).reverse() : []; return (

Welcome, Admin {user?.firstName}!

Total Orders

{totalOrders}

Total Revenue

â‚±{totalRevenue.toLocaleString()}

Total Products

{totalProducts}

Total Users

{totalUsers}
Add Product Add User

Recent Users

    {recentUsers.map(u => (
  • {u.firstName} {u.lastName} ({u.role}) {new Date(u.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
    • ))} {recentUsers.length === 0 &&
  • No recent users.
    • }

Recent Orders

    {recentOrders.map(o => (
  • Order #{o.orderNumber} by {o.customerName || o.customer || 'N/A'} {new Date(o.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
    • ))} {recentOrders.length === 0 &&
  • No recent orders.
    • }
{/* Product KPIs */}

Low Stock Products

    {lowStockProducts.length > 0 ? lowStockProducts.map(p => (
  • {p.name} ({p.category}) {p.stockQuantity} left
    • )) :
  • No low stock products.
    • }

Recently Added Products

    {recentProducts.length > 0 ? recentProducts.map(p => (
  • {p.name} ({p.category}) {p.createdAt ? new Date(p.createdAt).toLocaleDateString() : ''}
    • )) :
  • No recent products.
    • }

System Status

API Gateway
Database
Authentication
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
